name: MLSoundClassifier.FeatureExtractionParameters
desc: Parameters that affect the process of extracting sound features from audio files.

items.name: init(overlapFactor: Double, featureExtractor: MLSoundClassifier.ModelParameters.FeatureExtractorType, featureExtractionTimeWindowSize: TimeInterval?)
items.desc: Creates the parameters for a feature-extraction session.

items.name: init(overlapFactor: Double, featureExtractor: MLSoundClassifier.ModelParameters.FeatureExtractorType)
items.desc: Creates the parameters for a feature-extraction session with a default time window size.

items.name: var overlapFactor: Double
items.desc: The proportion of overlap that the feature-extraction session uses to analyze two consecutive windows in the audio data.

items.name: var featureExtractor: MLSoundClassifier.ModelParameters.FeatureExtractorType
items.desc: The algorithm type the session uses to extract features from audio files.

items.name: var featureExtractionTimeWindowSize: TimeInterval
items.desc: A time duration, in seconds, that determines how much audio data the feature-extraction session reads each time it samples an audio file.
